## ClashManager.fetch() method

Fetches a tournament by its ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(id: number, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<Tournament>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | number | The ID of the tournament. |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetch options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Tournament](./shieldbow.tournament.md)<!-- -->&gt;
